mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (username, birth, memberid, nickname, email, phone) VALUES (#{userName},#{birth},#{memberId},#{nickName},#{email},#{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT user.memberid, nickname, birth, email, phone, passwd, grade, active, username, type FROM user LEFT OUTER JOIN member ON user.memberid = member.memberid WHERE user.memberid = #{memberId} AND user.passwd = #{passwd}
SELECT * FROM member WHERE memberid=#{memberId} AND email=#{email}
